scripts.klickbait:install: npm install && cd vue && npm install && cd ../common && npm install && cd ../core && npm install
scripts.klickbait:dev: concurrently --kill-others "node configuration/installer/Installer.js" "http-server" "npm run dev --prefix vue" "npm run dev --prefix core" "npm run dev --prefix common"
scripts.klickbait:build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix core" "npm run build --prefix vue"
